mapper.select: SELECT d.`id` AS id, d.`department_code` AS departmentCode, d.`is_exist_childen` AS isexistChilden, d.`parent_id` AS parentId, d.`department_level` AS departmentLevel, d.`creater_by` AS createrBy, d.`create_date` AS createDate, d.`last_update_by` AS lastupDateBy, d.`last_update_date` AS lastupDateDate FROM department_t d ORDER BY d.`department_level` DESC, d.`parent_id`
